data.value: Enter a Title for the Event

data.value: Enter a Description for the Event

data.name: plImage.Help
data.value: Select an Image for this Event

data.name: plAlt.Help
data.value: Enter alternative text to display when the image is suppressed by the users browser

data.name: plEvery.Help
data.value: Enter the frequency of this event. Leave blank if not recurring.

data.name: plStartDate.Help
data.value: Enter the start date for the event

data.name: plTime.Help
data.value: Enter the Time of the Event

data.name: plExpiryDate.Help
data.value: Enter the expiry date for the recurring event

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About the Events Module

The Events Module displays upcoming events as a list in chronological order or in calendar format. Each event listing includes a title, description, image (optional), date and time (optional). Each event can be set to automatically expire on a particular date, or re-occur by any specified number of days, weeks, months or years. Height and width properties for calendar cells can be set.

Add an Event

  1. Click Add New Event.
  2. At Title, enter a title for the event.
  3. At Description, enter a description of the event.
  4. At Image (optional), select an image or upload a new file.
  5. At Alternate Text (required field if an image is used), enter text to be displayed on image mouse over.
  6. At Occurs Every (optional), select how frequently the event reoccurs.
  7. At Start Date, click Calendar and select the start date for the event.
  8. At Time (optional), enter a time in this format: 09:00 AM.
  9. At Expiry Date (optional), click Calendar and then select the expiry date for the event. The event will expire on this date.
  10. Click Update.

data.name: valEvery.Text
data.value: The frequency must be a number greater than zero
